Chrysler's`` business has gone well,'' Sergio Marchionne said Thursday, and its results are in line with guidance. Chrysler in November raised its operating profit estimate for the year to$ 700 million, implying a$ 135-million fourth-quarter operating income. The automaker had earned$ 565 million on that basis through three quarters.
